item.title: When Equality is Unfair
item.author: Mahfooz Hasan,
item.description: Equality is based on the mathematical equation. x = x, y = y, there’s no two ways about it. It has to be the same quantity, size, value etc. When applied to people, it refers to the state of being equal, especially in status, rights and opportunities.
